content.detailedDescription:
Like the witness in iowa, i see orbs in triangle formation every clear night at work and they seem to be hovering and even changing there position.

some orbs are changing colors and can shift position.

well, i invite you to look those orbs by yourself in the middle of the night.
content.summary: Orbs in triangle formation.

content.detailedDescription: I see these orbs every night at work and they seem to be hovering and even changing there position ulmost in sink.One of these things will change its position and very shortly the others will move so they keep there initial pattern and the srangest part is they dont seem to follow the normal shift of stars as the planet rotates it seems to be moving very slowly mind you in the oppisite direction.Also as i watched these whatever you want to call them i seen somthing shoot across there veiw .This thing was moving so fast it looked like a flash of ulmost tranparent light but it had a shape to the front of it like it were pointed the rest of it was blurred do to the ungodley speed it was traveling.Im not the only one who has seen these oddities but im the only one who will admit it ive watched alot of strange thing go on in that area of the sky for months now and im beginning to wonder if alot of what we think are stars arent.
content.summary: Group of star like orbs in a distinct  triangle pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
I was hiking at powell butte in the afternoon between 1 and 4 pm. at first they looked like white balloons floating by yet they wer in a line and some were moving faster then others and slowing down. there were about 8 of them and at the end one they were being followed by an airplane. i have seen these before so i was happy they were showing themselves to me again. they always seem to do a formation when i see them.   i attempted to recreate it although its not exact. i lost sight because of trees in the way.


^^^
   ^
   ^
   ^
     ^
     ^
     ^
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: They looked like white baloons with light around them. i call them lightships so i hope sphere is the correct term.

content.detailedDescription:
Took kids to the playground at river road park in north salem (river road/n. broadway); arrived just after 2pm.  watched them play for a few minutes, looked ssw at the clouds:  mostly billowy storm clouds--heavy rains on and off during the past couple of hours, w/periodic showers starting earlier in the day.  first noticed a hawk's nest in a tree at the same direction, about 100 feet off the ground:  one bird left the nest and circled, the other bird remained to watch the nest; first bird returned a couple of times.  my kids and i watched the birds/nest directly for about five minutes, then they played and i watched them.

periodically, i looked at both the hawk's nest and the coming storm clouds while the kids played.  at one point, directly above the nest by several feet (approximate, based on distance from ground), i noticed what i first thought was a balloon.  it rose very slowly in the sky towards the clouds.  several things immediately stood out:  object was black, was at first spherical in shape, but appeared to almost change into an egg/oval shape as it moved, heavy winds were blowing storm clouds from the ssw to w very quickly--but the object continued to move directly up as if moving against the wind.  i watched it move slowly and directly upwards, seeming to 'change' between sphere and oval, for at least four/five minutes, still entirely against the wind.  it then stopped, and stayed stationary for about a minute (definitely not as long as the upwards movement); very dark storm clouds were quickly approaching it, but its own dark color stood in contrast to the clouds.  then the object moved horizontally--positionally wnw--at an incredible speed, and disappeared into the cloud bank.  i watched for at least a couple of minutes to see if it emerged out of the cloud bank--the wind was moving the clouds quickly--but saw nothing further.

again, at first thought it was a balloon, like one of the large ones used by car dealerships to draw attention, but there are none in that part of town--or across the river (willamette), for that matter, nor was there a tether seen.  too, from the apparent distance from the ground--perhaps several miles--the likely size of it would've made it unlikely to be a commercial balloon.  but the general fact of it moving in a straight line upwards against fairly heavy winds for several minutes negated that it was a balloon; too was the fact that it stopped/remained stationary for at least a minute against fairly heavy winds.  and finally the fact that it moved against fairly heavy winds at a high rate of speed into an approaching cloud bank made it unlikely that it was a balloon.

i'm not entirely convinced of what i saw.  just the distances and weather patterns converging concurrently make me feel that a light object like a balloon wouldn't have functioned/moved in the manner that it did.  but similarly, perhaps the weather patterns and distances at the time made an ordinary object appear to act extraordinarily.  there is a national guard airbase in town, and perhaps they do conduct weather experiments...But the base is several miles away in the opposite direction.  it's been many years since i took a science class, so perhaps there's a logical explanation (ie, optical illusion, theory of physics) for why something moved the way it did for the duration it did...But thought i'd post this in case someone else in salem, or might have seen the same thing...
content.summary: Spherical/oval shape moving upwards against wind & clouds for several minutes; halted movement/stationary for at least a minute, disappeared fast into clouds.

content.detailedDescription: Driving back home from college with my girlfriend on the way back i glanced at the sky and notice a light yellow circle in the sky at first i thought it was a star but i noticed it was to large and to close to be a star it was large and in a still postion, about 4 seconds later it flew away at lightning speed and vanished in a blink of an eye leaving a small line of light for less than a second. i asked my girlfriend if she noticed what i saw and regretfully she didn't see. 2 months later she notice a ufo as well and has reported it already.
content.summary: Light yellow circular light.

content.detailedDescription: Seen a hammer head shaped object with abt 20 plus or so lights and one huge oval shaped light in its center fly slowly across the sky ... was walking form my communities mailbox area when i spotted the object .. i had to glance at it for abt 30 seconds before it sunk in that i was looking at something unusual ...  i finally started shouting to the other people who were on the porches to come see and when we all looked at it ..  relized it was humming .. with a tingy horn sound it was moving way way slow and wasn't moving in any direction or side to side or nothing then it slowly started to move off .. at abt 10 minutes in to seeing it turned on its side vertically and kept moving into the same direction gradually gaining altitude until we lost site of it....
content.summary: Seen a hammer head shaped object with abt 20 or so lights fly slowly across the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Me, three of my sons, and a neighborhood friend were out in
our fenced in backyard lighting fireworks. i noticed after about 30 
minutes of being out there, multiple lights to the north of us. these
lights traveled east at a somewhat fast pace. there were at least 
6-8 of these light travelling together, and all were amber color. i didn't 
notice any streaking like you'd see with a meteorite or space junk when 
entering our atmosphere. as these lights moved eastward, we noticed 
a police helicopter about 10 blocks away. i found outlater that night that 
there was a shooting in the area we saw this helicopter. there is no 
reason that they would not have noticed this. maybe you guys can look 
into who was flying the helicopter that night. i called a local news station, and
the lawrence police department the next day to see if other people 
reported the same thing, but according to whom i spoke to said that 
there was no report. to me that's impossible. those lights were bright, and 
travelling over a very well populated area. these objects moved gracefully 
across the sky. i know for a fact that they weren't earthly aircrafts. well that's 
it for now. this was the first time for me and my sons to witness something
like this. to tell you the truth i felt afraid at first because the lights at first glance
appeared to be coming our way, which would have been southward. but it's like 
they turned, but i really couldn't tell until they appeared to be going eastward.
content.summary: Several lights streak across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Moon of memphis

in mid-november 10pm of 1964,  i was asked by my mother to take out the garbage.  i went out back and i noticed a brite white full moon above.  i look closer and i noticed it had uniform whiteness so i could not see the shaded of white or grey that made the man in the moon face.  it was equally as bright as the normal full moon, bright enough to create a moon shadow.   i looked around and i noticed another moon bright orange rising over my neighbor house to the east across the street as i looked from the backyard through the side yard to the front.  it had the features that created the man on the moon so i felt it was the real moon.  i looked above again and stared at the white moon for a few minutes then it made a rapid ascent in the sky.  as it rose it became smaller and smaller til it appeared to look like a bright star, then dim star then disappeared into space.  it reminded me of the star of bethleham when it was at a high altitude. 

i was only seven when i witness the ufo that i call the moon of memphis.  i had a good memory of the event so when i grew up and joined the air force as a navigator , i was able to analyze the event better with my aviation experience.  i estimated that the moon of memphis was at 20,000 feet and was about ten acres in size.  i developed this information from watching the ascent of the moon of memphis and remembering that it also pass through some high cirrus clouds that i estimated was at 60,000 feet,  at 20,000 feet it would have taken four 747s aircraft parked in a circle to cover the area of the moon of memphis ufo thus creating a ten acre size estimate.  when i saw it above me it was exactly the size of the real full moon when seen high in the sky.

i believe the ufo or moon of memphis was a sign of god.  when you take a thru z and match it with 1 thru 26,  you can add up the letters of words and get a sum number.  for example, israel adds up to sixty four which got me to think that the 1964 moon of memphis ufo had religious significance since israel equals sixty four.  whereever the moon of memphis came from or however it was created was certainly a unique phenomenon of divine origin and purpose.  its appearance in 1964 also suggest religious intellect.

from voices, visions and dreams that i experienced thirty three years later,  i  believe it had a message for humanity.  it wanted humanity to be more reverent to all living beings and animals.  the consciousness of each being or animal is precious and must be respect more.  before animals are killed, they should receive anathesia to be allow to put in a unwakable sleep before being killed.  anything less is cruel, heartless, and unreverent of that being and god.  maybe humanity will find a way to eat without killing animals but until then we must not kill an animal while it is awake.  treat innocent animals the same as you would like to be treated if you were in their place.  the moon of memphis is proof that god does exist and we should obey god���������s wish for us to be more kind to each living being.

[cms/tg/pid]
capt usaf/ lt uscg retired
content.summary: Ufo called the moon of memphis appeared for possible religious purpose

content.detailedDescription: My hobby is taking pics of planes and i hate it when these flying things get in the pictures.
content.summary: I hate it when these get in my picture.

content.detailedDescription:
This took place 10 minutes after my first ever ufo sighting reported previous.  i got into work, told a coworker about what i had seen.  she thought it was fun, and i was excited to tell someone.  while i got ready to start working, i kept looking out the windows (facing east)  hoping to see something else.  after that much creepy excitement, it's normal to "want it again."  i didn't expect to see anything.

i thought it was a plastic grocery bag at first - there have been two that the wind has brought up to our floor.  this wasn't collapsed, and moving with the wind, it was full and floating straight up.  i called my coworker over to have a look.  i estimate the object was 2-3 blocks away.  it looked like an opaque white jellyfish without tentacles -  think of an upside down "u" that's closed at the bottom and more plump.  it rose into the air, then slowed down, not hovering, but not rising as fast.  other opaque, white, smaller globes appeared and circled around it.  i saw 4 of these "pursuers" during this event.  they raced around the larger orb and were noticeably faster than it.  the orb began to move south.  the smaller globes chased it.  it reminded me of small birds chasing a larger bird away from their nest.  i looked for bird wings, but the shape of the globes didn't change during their movement.  if they were birds, i would have seen some kind of change in shape as they beat their wings and turned.   my coworker turned away and started back for her desk, telling me, "i'm not looking anymore, i'm too creeped out."  but she did see them.

the large orb moved south half a block, then, with one orb still chasing it, veered east towards msu's campus and was gone in a second . . . faded out of sight.  the small orb chasing it broke off it's chase and disappeared the same way.  i looked back at the original location, and one last orb was rising into the sky where the original larger one initially was, and disappeared.

i didn't have a camera with me, and my cellphone is old and doesn't have one that would've taken a usable picture.  i felt excited and curious.  i wasn't scared during this event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Jellyfish with no arms being chased by white orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
We were driving down i- 75 hway southbond towards the city saginaw, zilwaukee bridge, i was drivng and i look over to my right and noticed this huge craft hovering over the city, i couldnt belive what i saw, ive seen ufos before in my hometown of lewiston, but nothing like this it was traingle shape, it was there for at least 4-5 minutes i didnt have a camera with me and my cell phone camera was good enough to take the shot, everybody on the bridge seem to see it some slowed down and some stop, i couldnt belive this my girlfriend see it as well. the only thing i new it was a airplane or anything else ive seen before, im true beliver that were not alone. i didnt feel scared, but kinda nervous, and shock more then anything, i didnt see the object take off so i know it was still there after i drove off. i was driving downstate so i had to keep going, but it still puzzles me to this day, thank you for my opportunity to report my sighting, thank you 
(*deleted wit's name-sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: It was hovering over the city of saginaw, right on the zilwaukee bridge in a triangular shape.

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from the store. i spoted 3 high flying triangles. they made a loud humming sound and few in formation. i believe these are new type of miltary planes
content.summary: 3 triangle ufos over house.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving with some of my family down to florida on i-95. on not one, but two separate occasions i noticed the same low-flying, very bright object dart across the sky at dazzling speeds with no tail and then suddenly disappear. everyone in my car was asleep but i woke them up to tell them the story. it was so absurdly noticeable that i expected there to be an uproar about it online but i only found one small article! it was very fast but i'm shocked that more people aren't asking questions.
content.summary: A low flying very bright almost circular object flew south for about 4 seconds then disappeared. i was on i-95 headed to florida.

content.detailedDescription:
It was 10:30 pm,and i usually walk around outside aimlessly outside my house. i looked north towards 29 palms military base and farther towards the direction of area 51 suprisingly. what i saw blew my mind it was 4 things flying  fast following 1 yellow thing. at first i thought it was military jets (maybe who knows). but they were zipping all over the place, there was dim yellow light 4 of the red ones were following

i tried to recreate the scienario in adobe flash (poorly)

contact me a [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: 4 red fast moving objects following one yellow one.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting at the pool on 6/12/2010 with my girlfriend and 3 neighbors. we noticed a white object in the southern sky hoving and slow moving towards the south.  1st thought it might be a ballon but wasn't gaining altitude.  happened to have my camera and took a short film of it.  then went back to enjoyng my day at the pool not thinking to much about it.  then a friends said that is was still in the sky.  so i grabbed my camera again and took another short movie.  by this time it seemed to move further south away from my location, but noticed that i had a near by tree that i could use during the 2nd movie to give it depth.  

object was een by five different people at the same it.
content.summary: White object seen during daytime.

content.detailedDescription: I am tbe assitant state director for missouri mufon.  i was driving home from a mufon meeting last night heading north on i-435 hear raytown when i noticed a very large bright light in the sky north of my position and to my east at approximately 75 degrees off the horizon.  this is close to the area called "tv hill" where there are several large tv towers, and at first i thought it might be one of the lights on the towers, however, as i approached i noticed that the object was located before the towers and was too large and too bright to be one of those lights.  it flickered on and off and was just inside the clouds, moving in and out of the clouds so i couldn't get a good look at the shape or structure, but it appeared by be round.  then, the object moved very, very fast (almost too fast to see) across i-435 to my left (west) and settled in to an area over kansas city and again, just inside the clouds.  this time it was located under venus, which was barely visible through the clouds.  the size was huge, it would take a dvd to cover it up held at arm's length.  i probably watched it for a good three minutes while driving. it wavered around, and then appeared to take on a triangular shape just before i had to exit the highway on 23rd street and head east away from it. normally, i would have pulled over to the side of the road to get a better look or maybe a photo, but for some reason i just headed home.
content.summary: Bright large object moved over i-435.

content.detailedDescription:
During a sightseeing trip touring the medellin metro, i saw this object that has no credible explanation. first i thought it was a toy, but to observe the height and shape of the object was not normal. had no visible cords or anything that would hold. also in the afternoon, while i was in a kind of cable car saw the object again in a different area from where the ufo look, unfortunately i could not record it because i could only see for a short time.
i reported after this time because i had not report it to mufon interested in, but got the video on youtube and maybe will be helpful.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=18lwtvdjjno

sorry, but my english is bad...
content.summary: Floated for hours.

content.detailedDescription: Outside smoking and looked up to see a bright white light in the western sky. seemed like it was moving like another airplane (which was closer), but not red and green lights. just very bright white light. i watched it move and then in suddenly (within a matter of seconds) appeared to move vertically, the light faded and then disappeared from view.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright white light moves slowly across sky then vertical, light fades and disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out having a smoke, when i noticed a bright star in the distance(what i thought was a star, to be precise).  but as i admired how bright it was, i noticed it's shape and intensity was very...Inconsistent, for a lack of a better term.  i felt kind of mesmerized, but then cautious. it seemed serene in nature, but i didn't quite understand what i was looking at.  i just thought "like the luster of a diamond.  with intensity like a laser up close"  i ran inside for a second opinion from my folks, but they looked at it from half across the room through the window, then looked back at the tv and said it was a star.  not very much was put into the observation, so i left it at that.  went back out, and just couldn't help but feel excited about what i was looking at.  but i had other things to do, so i just let it be.  

i figured if it was truly a cosmic event, be it ufo or a cosmic occurance, it's not really for me to do anything about it.  but after seeing that, i couldn't help saying something this time.
content.summary: I saw what i thought was a star, but...

content.detailedDescription:
I just entered a report yesterday regarding this star like light i have seen the last two weekends and again last night between 8:00 pm and 9:00 pm. tonight i had my daughter who lives with me and my grand son out watching it with me. it stayed in one place it seemed like for an hour and yet you could tell it was moving but just not fast enough for us to see the movement. we were out in the front of our home and it was in the west sky up above the c shaped moon right above a neighbors house top however i could walk out back of our house and see it very clear because it took the next door house out of the way so it was a clear view. my daughter was outside trying to take a picture with her digital camera and she also looked through my binoculars and saw that it looked very bright but had a red glow around it. we also saw several flashing objects come from the same direction but not sure if they came out of the star like object. while i was out back of the house viewing it all of a sudden i saw like a spot light kind of transparent but yet bright round circle like light streak across the back yard above my yard yet almost in front of me as it streaked across it was almost like it was going to land somewhere in back of the house or in a neighbors yard but as it streaked across it disappeared. i did get a picture but the one here came from my phone camera and its very small right above the moon and looks like star. 

maybe someone can take the pic and zoom in on it i am not sure but i got the pic anyway. it seems as long as we watch it it hangs around but each time i watch it to see if it will move away from us but it never goes anywhere until i go into the house then i go back out and once it had moved to the northwest sky i stated last report that it was southwest but not knowing my directions i was told that it is northwest.. last night it was gone when i went back out.
content.summary: Bright light hovering over city.

content.detailedDescription: I stepped outside to have a cig. i very often look at the sky since 7/30/07. the truth is i have been ridiculed by town people since 07 and its been rough.This time i will tell only in a report like this, i know the truth and that matters most. i saw a giant black triangle w/ 2 dull whites lights near 2 of its corners. it approached from the south, heading north almost directly overhead. it was at the least a couple footall fields in size. it traveled very slow and maybe 2-300ft high. it traveled flat end fist, not point first,w/ two dull white lights near each corner. when it was almost overhead, one of those light got very bright and then receded back as it was. thats when i saw for a split second from the illumination that the texture was not smooth, but appeared rough and it kind of glittered a little bit, like sunshine would on some black granite rock. it was 100% silent and kept moving slowly north, same alltitude and speed, till out of sight. ( the 2 dull white light were round in shape) and thats it.
content.summary: Very large, 2 dull white lights, black w/ rough texture.

content.detailedDescription: First, when leaving a home depot at approximately i noticed the most unusual cloud pattern in the sky. so unusual in fact that after making my purchase i came back into the store and called attention to it. at which time one of the clerks came out and took a picture of the event. it was magnificent. i then came home with my purchase and began to went into my home. after remaining in the house for approximately 45 minutes to an hour. i decided to go outside and gaze at the stars which has become a regular habit. i first went into my back yard and after several minutes, noticed nothing unusual. i came back into the house and heard the dog down stairs wanting to go outside. so i let him out and i went out with him.  while waiting for him to finish his business, i began to star gaze again. at first i didn't notice anything unusual and then i looked toward where the unusual cloud formation was earlier, and there in the same general direction was an extremely bright star. it was so bright in fact it was a bit unsettling to look at. but i was curious as to what it was. i thought at first that it was perhaps venus or even some other planet. so i went back in the house and got my binoculars and gazed at the star through them. i want to be extremely clear and detail as to what i saw. first while looking at this intense light emiting from the star i noticed that the light from it started to dim and after about 20-30 seconds went completely out. i then tried to refocus my binocs and no longer saw a star like shape that was emiting light, instead the light from another source was now illuminating it. and it was huge! extremely huge and moving across the sky at an incredible rate for something its size. through the binocs at first glance it looked like a crescent moon in form and shape. but in the next few seconds changed from crescent to full moon in appearence. i could make out a lot of detail while observing it. but what i found interesting was that it was like this thing knew that i was watching it and began to turn off it light and assume the roll of a star of planet in the sky. let me just state for the record that i no longer believe that aliens are here on this planet. i know that they are! although i know that it will be difficult for me to prove unless or until they are ready to deal with such a savage and uncivilized culture such as ours then no matter how much they allow us to view them. it won't matter. they will continue to allow us to further corrupt ourselfs. tonight gave me the feeling that they have always been around and we just don't take the time to notice them. this message is not just for mufon, but for them also because i also belive that somehow they monitor all major communications on this planet. thanks for coming in peace.
content.summary: It looked like a planet floating through our atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: While vacationing in mackinac memorial weekend 2008 we were at the mackinac point lighthouse immediatly east of the bridge. i took a couple of pics of the bridge. when reviewing the pics i noticed one of them had spot. i have no idea what it is but i am confident it is not dirt, a bird, a plane or anything else known.
content.summary: Caught on film.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving the ellwood city hospital when i noticed the same orange object that my wife and i witnessed last 4th of july.  it made four changes in direction in a zig-zag pattern.  i called my wife and was telling her about the object when it appeared to get closer and briter.  before i could tell her what was happening, it change direction one more time then started to travel higher and got dimmer to where i could no longer see it in the sky.  all of this happened in about 5 minutes and the entire time it was quite and there were no extra noises like a jet engine or the sound of a prop plane or helocoptor.
content.summary: Brite orange in color with changing speed and directions.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been immersed in my work & suddenly i had a thought of looking at the sky & i lifted my head , dropped my brushes & very quickly raced to the window . there was a beautiful rainbow forming , yet at the same time something was urging me to go on the outside fast . at that point deep inside i just knew the ufo would be there but wasn't sure if i'll see it with my eyes , so i grabbed my camera (just in case) & almost run outside , knocking few things off , lol !  i was mesmerized at the site since the rainbow was even more bigger with more vivid hues . i took a photo & was about to turn & leave (thinking i'll might see it once i put the photo on the computer) , but at that instant i got an urgent feeling to turn around & take a photo at that precise moment .  amazingly , there i saw a white round light so i smiled & snapped the photo :-) i was very elated at that point , it seemed they did indeed wanted me to photograph it . 
for approximately 13 milli-seconds i saw the white sphere . it was just coming out of the rainbow , at about 45* off the horizon & exactly at a mid-point between east & south direction , obviously above the lake . 
 the 1st photo was taken at 6:22:35 pm & the 2nd photo at 6:22:48 pm that the ufo is visible on the photo attachment .  i went inside & looked out my window but the ufo wasn't visible at this point , however the rainbow now was enormous showing 7 different prismatic hues , it was just beautiful . 
 the whole experience actually relates to my dream i had last night and so i'm very pleased & thankful to our g-d . although i wanted to attach the 3rd photo i took , already at my home through the window , i've decided not to as it would identify the place of my abode .  the 2 photos are a close-ups of the event .
content.summary: White ufo in a spectacular rainbow over toronto & the lake.

content.detailedDescription:
The first time i saw the lights was a year ago when i would see them from my driveway while having a smoke. i first noticed a single bright flashing light that would light up on the mountain then once i would watch for a while i seen multiple lights 
that would move around the mountain . these lights are yellow white lights that flash very bright then go out then light up again repeatadly doing this while being in different places every time they flash up . a lot of people i hang out with have seen them. these lights could not be a star because there on the mountain and it couldnt be a fire so i dont know what it is. 

 


 you can sit for hours and watch the lights  are they will be flashing
 for probably  all night . if you live in mount shasta and want to see the lights then look up at the mountain on a clear night late at night and look at the mountain for a while and you might see something amazing




 (note: i still see these lights a lot and just seen them the other night where me and my brother seen four parrelel lights flash up on the mountain then go out
content.summary: Flashing bright lights that move around on the mountain.

content.detailedDescription:
Just before the sunset, i went to a top of a hill... and try to make peacefull contact with extraterrestrial spacecrafts and extraterrestrial beings. 

i went into a peacefull and zen state.  with my mind, i sent an invitation to extraterrestrials.

2 spheres appeared in the sky (one orange and white).  it wasn't venus because venus was on the other side.

the two spheres slowly moved.  quickly some civil aircrafts rushed to the area, and flew to the spheres.

i went down the hill and the 2 spheres slowly moved into my direction.

on my next expedition... i will try to invite them to land in the field, i want to meet who are in those spacecrafts?
can they help us to fix the oil spill in gulf of mexico?
i want to know who they are, and if they can help us... according to a japanese scientific and professor michio kaku... the oil spill can last many, many years... maybe we need some extraterrestrial help?
content.summary: 2 bright spheres (orange and white).

content.detailedDescription:
I believe it was in late summer early fall of 1983 at about 4:00 p.M. and my wife and oldest daughter(aged 5) were standing in the door when my wife looked startled at something. i went to the door and observed a triangular craft approaching croswell rd. it was heading straight for us. it was completely silent. i ran out to the center of the road at the same time
as it reached the road. it was about 150 ft above me when in succession 3 balls of light left the nose of the craft on the left side circling under the nose. the first one headed for me. i ducked down to the right but it was very fast and must have touched my left shoulder. i woke up in my own bed shaking and afraid. my wife was sleeping soundly next to me. i noticed the clock read 2:00. i lay there and tried to tell myself that it was a dream. i went over the events of the previous day but could not remember what happened after about 4:00. watching t.V. going to bed and could
remember nothing. i did not get back to sleep that night. the next day i asked my wife what we had done or watched or talked about the night before but she flat out would not speak on the subject continuing to change the subject. i can't let it go and the feeling that it was not a dream persists to this day. i have believed in u.F.O's for most of my life. i've read too many books on the subject to count. could i have manufactured this subconsciously from all i've read? i hope so because it is okay to
believe in this stuff when it involves someone else. i would rather not find out this was real because this would open a whole other can of worms. if the experience was real then what happened during the missing time? if i found out, how would that affect me? how would it affect my relationships? would i then experience a form of p.T.S.D. would i find out about more events? would i become paranoid that it might happen again?
on another note, my sister has sworn that she has been taken many times.
she has memories of having a hybrid baby placed in her arms and told that she needed to nurture it. she has many memories of telepathic conversations with grays. i don't know why, after all these years, i've decided to talk about this. maybe because i'm hoping talking about it will somehow let me release it. holding it in hasn't helped. i've always felt that i needed to tell somebody. well,thanks for giving me a forum.
                                                                           yours gratefully,
                                                                           reluctantly curious
 
help
content.summary: Wife, daughter and i saw triangular ufo then experienced missing time.

content.detailedDescription:
I have been visiting with my wife her mother at st lukes medical center for about a month now nearly daily. on sunday june sixth i was walking around the hospital looking at the clouds while my wife and her brother spoke about there mother's health condition.
i spotted very high in the sky a white "round" object acting as if it were caught in a dustdevil as it's movement was in a swirling pattern.It then flew down and then back to where i first spotted it.It looked to be a paper plate actually,but i knew it was very high and would have to be large,much larger than a piece of trash floating in the wind.It then started flying due north and i watched it disappear onto the horizon.It moved pretty quickly,but not much faster than a jet would move.
yesterday june 13 we were again at the hospital sitting outside smoking.My wife and father in law were talking for quite some time and i grew impatient and walked around the building to where i had seen the object the previous week.I looked up and at the same spot i saw what i thought was a military jet flying above my head,headed east,and right where i had seen it previously a white object was "hovering in place.This time smaller and lower than the previous object.I watched this object head north just as the previous one had and walked quickly around the building.My wife noticed me looking up and i asked her if she saw it...At this time the object came close to entering a low hanging cloud and i saw an object appear to drop out of it and enter an entirely different flight path,followed by another.These two objects were much quicker than the first.All three flew into the cloud and did not reappear after 7 or 8 minutes.My wife claimed to have seen a total of 4 objects leave the first with one flying off in a blink of an eye.I had been looking down as i was walking down a step and perhaps missed this one...
 i would think the first object to be smaller than a sedan,but it's hard to tell.The clouds that day were low and the objects flew into the cloud.
content.summary: White object in sky...Followed by 3 objects leaving it.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving on fwy101 from santa monica area towards ventura. when we were around calabasas area, i saw a white object in the sky and pointed it to my husband. he was driving and asked me, "where? i can't see." i said, "it's right there in front of us." the object was not so far from us, and it was recognizable. he kept saying, "i can't see it." i said, "can't you see that?" i kept pointing it and stared at it. within 10 seconds, the object went transparent like a magic. i said, "it disappeared!!!" our car has a window on the ceiling, and my husband opened the plastic slide. i looked up and tried to find the object, but it was gone. after that, we saw 3 or 4 airplanes going by. then i saw a couple of birds. i could tell wether they were airplanes or birds, but the object i saw had no wings and went transparent. there were no clouds at all. at first, i was looking at an airplane, but there were no wings. i thought the object was moving towards 9 oclock. my husband said, "maybe you can see different dimentions now because i could not see it." 
this was the second time i saw ufo. the first time was just 2 weeks ago. may 30th.Around 1:30 p.M, i was driving towards my house and i almost got home. there was a bright silver light in the clear blue sky. i looked up and within a second, it disppeared. i parked,got out of my car and looked around, but i could not see anything. i was very excited and told my husband.
content.summary: White object disappeared in the blue sky at day time.
